name: mri_segment_thalamic_nuclei_dti_cnn
description: Thalamic segmentation tool providing 0.7mm isotropic thalamus segmentation from registered T1, FA, and V1 volumes.

inputs.name: T1 images
inputs.description: Path to the T1 image(s) or folder containing images. These must be registered to the FAs in physical coordinates.

inputs.name: ASEG segmentation
inputs.description: Path to the ASEG segmentation(s) or folder. These must be registered to the FAs in physical coordinates.

inputs.name: FA images
inputs.description: Path to the FA image(s) or folder.

inputs.name: V1 images
inputs.description: Path to the V1 image(s) or folder.

inputs.name: Segmentation output
inputs.description: Path to the segmentation output(s) or folder.

inputs.name: Volume output
inputs.description: CSV file for volumes of all structures and subjects.

inputs.name: Posteriors output
inputs.description: Path to the posteriors output(s) or folder.

inputs.name: Number of threads
inputs.description: Number of cores to be used. Default is 1.

inputs.name: Force CPU
inputs.description: Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.

inputs.name: Model file
inputs.description: Path to an alternative model file.

output-files.name: Volume CSV Output
output-files.description: CSV file with volumes for all structures.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
